reviewtext: As far as lenses go I'm not an expert by any means. But I would say if you can afford $100 for a lens then these are pretty good. But I would recommend saving up or footing the bill for a more expensive one, as you get good shots with this, but I think they could be better. I have a T2i and the shots I get from this are decent, but I have a feeling could be a lot better with a higher quality lens. It's good for the price.
